Args

Returns

add_current_uc.compare_intervals(row, interval)ïƒ

Compare a timestamp from a row with a given time interval.

Args

  • row (pd.Series): Row from the DataFrame with a â€˜timestampâ€™ column.

  • interval (dict): Dictionary with â€œfromâ€ and â€œtoâ€ datetime strings.

Returns

  • bool: True if timestamp is within interval, else False.

add_current_uc.label_realnetwork_csv(input_path='../backup/realnetwork.csv', output_path='../real_data.csv')ïƒ

Load the CSV, assign UC labels to each row, and save the updated file.

Args

  • input_path (str): Path to the input CSV file.

  • output_path (str): Path to save the labeled CSV file.

None
